greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of x -> A009194(x) needed to reach a fixed point when starting from x = n, where A009194(x) = gcd(x, sigma(x)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: If gcd(n,sigma(n)) = n, then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(gcd(n,sigma(n))).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 24 2019
